articles.title: Huge Mob Attacks Delhi Cops After 3 Nigerians Detained For Overstaying - NDTV
articles.description: Around100 people of African origin on Saturday surrounded a police team in the Neb Sarai area of South Delhi, clashed with them, and freed Nigerian nationals who had been detained over visa expiration by the anti-drugs force.
articles.content:
The detaineeswere being taken to the police station.

articles.title: Election: ECOWAS deploys 40 observers to Benin Republic - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: The Economic Community of West African States, has deployed 40 observers ahead of the January 8, 2023, legislative elections in Benin to support and monitor the entire electoral process.

articles.content:

articles.title: Take a look at British Airways' new cabin crew uniforms – its first revamp in 20 years - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: British Airways' new uniform includes a jumpsuit as well as a hijab and tunic option. Engineers and ground-operation agents will be first to switch.
articles.content: British Airways' announcement comes as other airlines revamp their uniforms to become more inclusive, breaking away from the industry's history of strict dress codes like a ban on tattoos and certain… [+239 chars]
